alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 7:06PM CDT until May 09 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sanford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ash Valley around 725 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Larned. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
